attributes.action: Introduce A National Zero-Tolerance Policy on Bullying in Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had a very hard time in my secondary schools at the hands of bullies. I do not feel anything is done to deter them. I think all schools should have a zero-tolerance '3 strikes' policy. By where a third strike results in immediate expulsion without question. Bullies are too often rewarded and not punished for their actions

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
